Package imageprocessing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProducerConsumerInterface
    Interface for Producer Consumer Thread Synchronization
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Buffer
    Class that holds 1/4 of an image as a byte array It is used by the Producer and Consumer at the same time, so it has to use synchronized methods to get and store info
    Color
    Class that stores the colors of a given pixel
    Consumer
    Concrete Class that consumes the buffer content and stores it in a new array It extends ProducerConsumer Abstract Class
    Dimension
    Class that is used to store dimensions as height and width
    Image
    Concrete class that extends Abstract Class ImageDetails and stores an image object as a byte array
    ImageDetails  
    PixelsMatrix
    Class used for storing pixels of an image as a 2d arry of integers
    Producer
    Concrete class that extends ProducerConsumer It is used for rading an image as a byte array and storing it into a buffer
    ProducerConsumer
    Abstract class that extends Thread Class and implements ProducerConsumerInterface Producer and Consumer Thread will extend this class and will Override process() method
    RegisterTime
    Class that can be used to measure time taken by a piece of code to execute
